Setting Port Channel

Port channel allows you to group several physical uplink Ethernet ports (link aggregation) to create one logical Ethernet link to provide fault-tolerance and high-speed connectivity.

To create port channels, perform the following.

 1. Enter the Name of the port channel and select the desired ports from the ports available. User can create multiple port channels for the available ports.

 2. Click Add to add the ports to the assigned port name.

Figure 5-1 Port Channel

 3. Click Save and next to proceed further.
